comments:
20011127
Upgraded from 20011114. (I am saying this in case it is important).
Had problems with lost JRE settings.
Reset JRE, and began running/debugging.
Several hours later, started having problems with debugger.
   (added note to PR: http://dev.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=2990)
Deugger problems got worse to the point where debugger was unusable.
   (sent email to DW).
Decided to quit eclipse and reboot.
On exiting eclipse, it crashed.
   (put javacore dump into PR: http://dev.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=6452)
Rebooted machine.
Restarted eclipse.
No longer have a Java perspective.
   (opened PR: http://dev.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=6451)
Clicked on the "Add perspective" tool.
Got the following Internal Error dialog:
"Plugin org.eclipse.jdt.ui activation failed while loading class 
org.eclipse.jdt.ui.JavaPerspectiveFactory"
The dialog was accompanied by the following walkback in the .log:
